page.title: 04SPENCER PARK
page.content:
SPENCER PARK
Spencer Park has been there for ages but it has had a few changes to make the park a better place. It has two sets of swings and slides, one for the older people and one for the youngsters so they do not get hurt. There is also a cricket pitch. In the First World War they used to have a tank at the gate where you came in. It was used for the children to play on but in the Second World War it was taken away, probably for scrap metal. By the children's swings there is an old road roller. There is a bowling green and tennis courts which are open most hours. There is a bridge which goes over a stream to get to a BMX track which has just been built.
Shaun Cooper
